56029b07-ae34-47ad-8b9f-1d6aa3e8fcb8.name: 战斗反射
56029b07-ae34-47ad-8b9f-1d6aa3e8fcb8.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

88e57fd9-40b2-45c3-88a7-b016c59dc0e5.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

80f12f3f-eaad-4cc1-909b-7f7c925b4b77.name: 健康
80f12f3f-eaad-4cc1-909b-7f7c925b4b77.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

5b3f96ad-fb2b-4a94-b530-bb40066fdc34.name: Fit, Very
5b3f96ad-fb2b-4a94-b530-bb40066fdc34.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

62a49f86-390a-4256-be5e-0e00c5f6f402.name: 高痛阈
62a49f86-390a-4256-be5e-0e00c5f6f402.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture
